price: tienen temor del Compasivo en privado, y se presentan con un corazón obediente.
arabic: مَّنۡ خَشِيَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنَ بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَجَآءَ بِقَلۡبٖ مُّنِيبٍ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: man khashiya al-raḥmāna bil-ghaybi wajāa biqalbin munībin
